 2006-09992006-09-21FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MINING TAXES) by eliminating the prorating formula that reduces the deduction for taxes paid to a province on mining activities to the extent that the taxpayer's income from mining activities for federal income tax purposes is less that their income for provincial tax purposes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0207 Publication Date: 2006-10-04
